name: Tool Poster (Detroit)
description: My second poster for Tool's 2019 Fall Tour is out now and was released at Detroit's show! Those who know me personally know I'm from the Detroit area originally so when Tool asked me to be a part of the artist line up for the tour I requested my home town as one of the stops I'd do and they said yes! There's nods to the sculpture "The Spirit of Detroit" and a Michigan map peppered in for some backstory.
